evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the defendants shall answer or otherwise respond to the remainder of the complaint within 21 days of this order.

extracted.value: 21 days: defendants shall answer or otherwise respond to the remainder of the complaint within 21 days of this order.

evidence.text: Consent/Refusal form to Magistrate Judge William E. Duffin be filed within 7 days
the materials must be filed within 30 days of service of the motion for summary judgment
